original_text: The dragon stood on the shore of the sea. And I saw a beast coming out of the sea. It had ten horns and seven heads, with ten crowns on its horns, and on each head a blasphemous name.
korean_text: 내가 보니 바다에서 한 짐승이 나오는데 뿔이 열이요 머리가 일곱이라 그 뿔에는 열 왕관이 있고 그 머리들에는 신성 모독 하는 이름들이 있더라

sentences.original_text: The dragon stood on the shore of the sea.
It had ten horns and seven heads,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 열 뿔과 일곱 머리를 가졌으며,

sentences.original_text: with ten crowns on its horns,
and on each head a blasphemous name.
